meanings.sent1: The new tent was tentier than the old one.
meanings.sent2: The larger tent was tentier and provided more space.
meanings.sent3: The tentier shelter kept us dry during the storm.
meanings.sent4: Her tentier sleeping bag made camping more comfortable.
meanings.sent5: The tentier fabric blocked out the sunlight effectively.

meanings.sent1: The tentier fabric was more durable than the previous one.

meanings.sent3: The tentier material kept the warmth inside on cold nights.
